	,((,))subscript((,)),

§§ Lists

Lists look like this:

	• list item 1
	• list item 2
	•• list item 2.1
	•• list item 2.2
	• list item 3

And like this:

	‣ list item 1
	‣ list item 2
	‣‣ list item 2.1
	‣‣ list item 2.2
	‣ list item 3

And like this:

	⁃ list item 1
	⁃ list item 2
	⁃⁃ list item 2.1
	⁃⁃ list item 2.2
	⁃ list item 3

Note that the list bullet symbols used are:

• "``•``" U+2022 Bullet
• "``‣``" U+2023 Triangular Bullet
• "``⁃``" U+2043 Hyphen Bullet
